name: JumpShoot
description:
Screen travels right as you jump platforms and shoot monsters. Each dead enemy adds 10 points, each missed shot loses 5 and each enemy that gets through loses 10. High scores are stored globally.

The older, harder version is stored here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Z7ZI3L8TXs12KxAMzfVLYZ4EDJFwCANl/view?usp=shari...

In this one, jumping is manual and requires precision.
